snippet.title: On the Road: Travel Safety
snippet.description: * On the Road: Travel Safety Healthy and safe traveling, whether to a far off place or just down the road, requires care and preparation. Because visiting a new location puts your body in contact with unfamiliar and different food, water, climate, and air quality, it’s not uncom...

snippet.title: Travel Abroad - Watch the Road
snippet.description: * Travel Abroad - Watch the Road The greatest threat to Americans traveling abroad isn't an exotic tropical disease like malaria. According to US State Department data, the number one cause of death of US citizens traveling internationally is motor vehicle accidents (MVA). Infectiou...

snippet.title: Hitting the Road with Type 2
snippet.description: * Hitting the Road with Type 2 My wife and I will soon be driving out from the San Francisco Bay Area to southern Utah. snippet.title: On the Road Again: Eating Healthy While Traveling
snippet.description: * On the Road Again: Eating Healthy While Traveling I am writing this post on a plane to Las Vegas for a speaking engagement. snippet.title: Dealing with Hot Flashes on the Road
snippet.description: * Dealing with Hot Flashes on the Road Hot flashes are an unavoidable and unpredictable part of menopause. They can come on anytime and anywhere. Since you can’t predict hot flashes, you might be faced with one when traveling – in your car, on an airplane or on the train. If you find your...
